ygData.subject: leaving?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... killing and then dying by someone elses train and losing twice the exp I spent the night getting. ... Awww, that s a shame man. :(   Don t want to stick
ygData.messageBody:
>Actually, I'm seriously considering quitting EQ and selling my account.
>It's bad enough that I only have a couple of hours a night to play, but
>half of that has to be spent half-soloing while trying to get a group in
>this overcrowded world, and the other half some monotone pulling and
killing and then dying by someone elses train and losing twice the exp >I
spent the night getting.
>Just not worth it.
>And anyways, I already got a $300 offer on my 26 Wizard :)

Awww, that's a shame man. :( Don't want to stick it out eh? I can see
your point though...I was having a period of boring lull between 23 and 25.
I was very close to giving up too. But for some reason, I REALLY REALLY
want to see what it is like to be 50. :) Once I discovered Cazic everything
started picking up again... making almost a whole level a night reminded me
of the old days. heh

I haven't found the crowds a big issue lately. My server Veeshan has
matured a little bit so there's not so much fighting for Mobs and treasure.
The power-levelers did their thing and are moving on. When I hopped on
Quellious the other time it was crazy all over again...100 little elves
running around killing bats and spiders was a little psycho. :)

-- Lim'Dul
